revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Annotation and review of proofreading corrections.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p: i had company yesterday so i dident didn't write to you we had aunt freelove s Freelove's daughter elizabethElizabeth with an other lady here yesterday i got your letter this morning and i got three last week i dont don't know what i would doo do waltWalt if it wasent wasn't for you to think of me it seems as if all the other sons and daughters has their own to attend to which is perfectly natural) georgeGeorge and loo and Jeff insists on my breaking up houskeepinghousekeeping they dident didn't only insist but almost commanded me i told them i should remain here this winter if i lived) they none of them want eddEdd walterWalter and they would soon get tired of paying his board) and we aint ain't much expence expense to any but but you walterWalter dear for any thing but houseroom at any rate i shant shan't break up as long as i can get around if i lose the use of my limbs altogether then i wont won't object i suppose they do it for the best they think i live so lonesome) but waltWalt dont don't worry about me breaking up i have had my way as eddEdd says to long)

i had a letter from loo since they went home jimmy behaved very well while they was away but after they got home he stayed out late and on wensday Wednesday night he was out all night he went to a political meeting and the band of music atractedattracted him he said he slept in the alley but loo seems to have great patience with him she said he took on and cried and promised to not do so any more he would only be a good boy)

walt i have a poem by Jean Bruce Washburn of the yo semiteYosemite valley californiaCalifornia mrsMrs. stantons Stanton's aunt i think its beautiful its a small pamphlet i will send it to you if you wish walterWalter write walterWalter if you would like it
the old indianIndian tradition i think is so beautiful
the fire in the woods on the prairie is awfull to read
